price: Ni ho rero Musa yaterera nya nkoni hasi, ya nkoni ica iramiragura nya mizana n’inkoni vya ba bakonikoni, gutyo aba aratsinze. Ba bakonikoni baciye bubama, maze bavuga bati: “Twemeye Imana Rurema ya Musa na Haruna, kuko ivyo twiboneye n’amaso, si ubukonikoni namba”.
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
